description:
misc/kate: fix multiline raw string syntax highlighting error.
From VisualFC.
Fixes issue 4862.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

you may need to find a kate user to verify this fix.

please make the description something like this
(sentence in parenthesis is my comment, please leave them off):

misc/kate: fix multiline raw string syntax highlighting error
(we don't have a directory named misc/kate/go, and as there is only one
file in misc/kate, mention misc/kate is enough)
(write in detail what is fixed, and as the first part already mentions kate,
no need to mention it again in the 2nd part)
From VisualFC.
(put the original author in the body of description.)
Fixes issue 4862.
(wow, somehow we get 3462 more issues :) )

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, minux.ma@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
i'll ok this if another kate user claims it is correct.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c76d8e470353 ***

misc/kate: fix multiline raw string syntax highlighting error.
From VisualFC.
Fixes issue 4862.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7568043

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

subject: code review 7568043: misc/kate: fix multiline raw string syntax highlighting...
